attributes.action: have the queen bestow the honour of knighthood on William Shantner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the people of this nation, do demand that the great and honourable William Shatner be knighted by our Queen. 

It is an insult and an outrage that the mighty Bill has not already been knighted, and so we call for this situation to be rectified post haste.

For decades William has been a guiding light and inspiration to people across the globe, it is full time that he is acknowledged for his services to the people of this country, and indeed, the world.
